content.raw:
Disableing effects in gnome doesn't help.
The SEGFAUT happen during loading GLSL shader, so it looks like a problem with shaders.
After some debbuging i found that the problem is in the shader which is used for sky rendering.
When i removed line 1147: this->renderTarget->addListener(this->GetScene()->skyx); from Camera.cc gazebo start without segfault.
